item.title: Retain scroll position in infinite scroll
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Infinite scroll - Benefits and Challenges Infinite scroll has become a popular web design technique in recent years, as it offers several benefits over traditional pagination models such as reducing page load times or minimizing the need for users to browse through multiple pages.
